faq.title: ❓ FAQ – Fake Broken Screen
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our Broken Screen Effect

questions.question: 1. What is the Fake Broken Screen tool?
questions.answer: It's a web-based simulator that displays a cracked or damaged screen effect on your display. It doesn't harm your device — it's just a visual illusion.

questions.question: 2. Is it safe to use?
questions.answer: Yes! It doesn't download or install anything. It simply shows an image overlay in your browser.

questions.question: 3. Can I prank someone with it?
questions.answer: Absolutely 😄 Just open it in full screen and hand your device to a friend — watch their reaction!

questions.question: 4. How do I exit the broken screen effect?
questions.answer: Press Esc or F11 to instantly return to your normal display.

questions.question: 5. Does this work on phones or tablets?
questions.answer: Yes, it works on any device — desktop, laptop, or mobile browser.
